backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles and service requests with access control, status tracking, notes, and CRUD-style operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing brandingâ€‘related features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend page, component, and hook in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global style resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring root element and document title for the frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout, theming, and application providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/NotesPanel: Admin panel for viewing and adding public or internal notes on a request.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with login and home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin routes by verifying authentication and admin status before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout button logic using Internet Identity with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts authenticated users without a profile to submit basic profile information.
frontend/src/components/BrandCard.tsx: Reusable card wrapper with consistent border, background, and shadow styling.
frontend/src/components/FormField.tsx: Wrapper component adding labels, helper text, and error display around form inputs.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Displays categorized service pricing using BrandCard components and data from the services catalog.
frontend/src/components/RequestStatusTim: Renders a vertical timeline of request status changes with icons, timestamps, and current-status highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ServiceSelection: Displays service groups with checkboxes and handles selection state updates.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders site footer with service links, support links, and branding information.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Renders the main header with navigation, login button, mobile menu, and pricing scroll behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSideReferenc: Manages client-side reference image files with add, remove, and clear utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating, fetching, and updating service requests through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports app branding constants including name, subtitle, and full title.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Defines a catalog of services with pricing and helper functions for filtering, formatting prices, and calculating totals.
frontend/src/lib/statusUtils.ts: Maps request statuses to human-readable labels and UI variants.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestDet: Admin view for a single request with status updates, price editing, and notes panel.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestsPa: Admin list page showing all service requests with filtering by status and navigation to detail views.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component with hero, services preview, navigation buttons, and hash-based scroll handling.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestConfirm: Displays confirmation details for a submitted service request, including request ID and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestPage.ts: Form page for creating service requests with validation, image uploads, service selection, and submission via API.
frontend/src/pages/StatusLookupPage.tsx: Lookup page allowing users to enter a request ID and view request details and status timeline.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and state including schema version and project name. Contains branding update feature entries and no new feature requests.
